refnamediv.refpurpose: Displays a brief description of each item in the list of objects.

refsection.title: DESCRIPTION
refsection.para: Displays a brief description of each item in the list of objects. If the item is a primitive shape, the type of shape and its vertex are displayed. If the item is a combination, the Boolean formula for that combination - including operands, operators, and parentheses - is displayed. If the combination is flagged as a region, then that fact is also displayed along with the region's ident code, air code, los, and GIFT material code.

refsection.title: EXAMPLES
refsection.para: The example shows the use of the cat command to display Boolean formulas for two regions.
